rqmlativ 0.0.9

Get a GradeReportTemplate

Source: R/Grading.R
getGradeReportTemplate.Rd

This function returns a dataframe or json object of a GradeReportTemplate

getGradeReportTemplate(
  GradeReportTemplateID,
  AcademicSessionType = F,
  AdvisorNameFormat = F,
  BlankSignatureLabel = F,
  ColumnHeaderLabel1 = F,
  ColumnHeaderLabel10 = F,
  ColumnHeaderLabel2 = F,
  ColumnHeaderLabel3 = F,
  ColumnHeaderLabel4 = F,
  ColumnHeaderLabel5 = F,
  ColumnHeaderLabel6 = F,
  ColumnHeaderLabel7 = F,
  ColumnHeaderLabel8 = F,
  ColumnHeaderLabel9 = F,
  CommentPrintType = F,
  ConfigEntityYearID = F,
  CourseDescriptionFormat = F,
  CourseFilter = F,
  CreatedTime = F,
  Description = F,
  DisplayPeriodCodeSort1 = F,
  DisplayPeriodCodeSort2 = F,
  DisplayPeriodCodeSort3 = F,
  DisplayPeriodCodeSort4 = F,
  EarnedCreditsMethodIDDefaultOverride = F,
  FamilyPrintType = F,
  FreeFormGradingLegend = F,
  GPAField1 = F,
  GPAField2 = F,
  GPAField3 = F,
  GPAField4 = F,
  GPAField5 = F,
  GPAField6 = F,
  GPAField7 = F,
  GPALabel1 = F,
  GPALabel2 = F,
  GPALabel3 = F,
  GPALabel4 = F,
  GPALabel5 = F,
  GPALabel6 = F,
  GPALabel7 = F,
  GradeReportAcademicSessionTemplateGroupID = F,
  GradeReportColumnGroupIDSecondary = F,
  GradeReportTemplateIDClonedFrom = F,
  GradingSort = F,
  GuardianNameFormat = F,
  HasLogo = F,
  HideReportSection = F,
  HideSignatureSection = F,
  IncludeCurrentYearClasses = F,
  IncludeInProgressGrades = F,
  IncludePhoneInEntityAddress = F,
  IncludePhoneInGuardianAddress = F,
  IncludeTranscriptNotes = F,
  IncludeTransferCourses = F,
  MediaIDLogo = F,
  ModifiedTime = F,
  NoReceivingFamily = F,
  OfficialSignatureLabel = F,
  PrintAllCourseRowHeaders = F,
  PrintAttendanceTotals = F,
  PrintBlankSignatureLine = F,
  PrintComments = F,
  PrintCTEPrograms = F,
  PrintElectronicSignature = F,
  PrintEndorsements = F,
  PrintFreeFormComments = F,
  PrintGPA = F,
  PrintGradeScaleAtTop = F,
  PrintHighFrequencyWords = F,
  PrintIndividualAttendanceTerms = F,
  PrintLettersAndSounds = F,
  PrintStudentHighlights = F,
  PrintVaccinations = F,
  PrintYearAttendanceTotals = F,
  PrintYearToDateTotals = F,
  ReceivesForms = F,
  ReportRunInfoID = F,
  StudentNameFormat = F,
  StudentSort1 = F,
  StudentSort2 = F,
  StudentSort3 = F,
  StudentSort4 = F,
  TeacherNameFormat = F,
  TemplateType = F,
  UseFreeFormGradingLegend = F,
  UseFullGPASection = F,
  UseFullGradesSection = F,
  UseGradeMarkDescriptionGradingLegend = F,
  UseGradeMarkRangeGradingLegend = F,
  UserIDCreatedBy = F,
  UserIDModifiedBy = F,
  UsesGPAOrEarnedCredits = F,
  UseStudentSectionLinking = F,
  fieldPaths = NULL,
  entityId = 1,
  query = NULL,
  flatten = T,
  returnResponse = F
)

Arguments

GradeReportTemplateID

The ID of the GradeReportTemplate to return.
fieldPaths

Fields from other objects with 'Many to One' or 'One to One' relationships to the given object listed as text. Run getSchemaForObjects('GradeReportTemplate') to get more field paths.
entityId

The id of the entity (school). Run listEntities for a list of entities. Defaults to 1 (district).
query

Queries to be added to the request. Ex. list(SchoolYearID = 1). Defaults to NULL.
flatten

Whether to flatten result into a dataframe or return the json object. Default is TRUE (flatten to dataframe).
returnResponse

Whether to return the server response instead of the results. Useful for debugging. Default is FALSE.
fieldNames

A TRUE or FALSE value determining whether or not to return the field for the given GradeReportTemplate. Defaults to FALSE for all return fields which, for convenience, returns all fields for the GradeReportTemplate.

Value

A dataframe or of GradeReportTemplate Skyward's Knowledge Hub

  • Value
